panels.description: Paris weather card: latest temperature with wind, humidity, duration, and update time.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT
    wm.city,
    wm.window_start,
    wm.window_duration,
    ROUND(wm.avg_temperature::numeric, 1) AS temperature,
    ROUND(wm.avg_humidity::numeric, 1) AS humidity,
    ROUND(wm.avg_wind_speed::numeric, 2) AS wind
  FROM weather_metrics wm
  WHERE $__timeFilter(wm.window_start)
    AND wm.city = 'Paris'
    AND wm.window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
  ORDER BY wm.window_start DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  city,
  window_start,
  window_duration,
  temperature,
  humidity,
  wind
FROM latest
UNION ALL
SELECT
  'Paris' AS city,
  NULL::timestamp AS window_start,
  'No data' AS window_duration,
  NULL::numeric AS temperature,
  NULL::numeric AS humidity,
  NULL::numeric AS wind
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM latest)

panels.title: Paris

panels.description: London weather card: latest temperature with wind, humidity, duration, and update time.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT
    wm.city,
    wm.window_start,
    wm.window_duration,
    ROUND(wm.avg_temperature::numeric, 1) AS temperature,
    ROUND(wm.avg_humidity::numeric, 1) AS humidity,

  FROM weather_metrics wm
  WHERE $__timeFilter(wm.window_start)
    AND wm.city = 'London'
    AND wm.window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
  ORDER BY wm.window_start DESC

)
SELECT
  city,
  window_start,
  window_duration,
  temperature,
  humidity,
  wind
FROM latest
UNION ALL
SELECT
  'London' AS city,
  NULL::timestamp AS window_start,
  'No data' AS window_duration,
  NULL::numeric AS temperature,
  NULL::numeric AS humidity,
  NULL::numeric AS wind
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM latest)

panels.title: London

panels.description: Berlin weather card: latest temperature with wind, humidity, duration, and update time.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT
    wm.city,
    wm.window_start,
    wm.window_duration,
    ROUND(wm.avg_temperature::numeric, 1) AS temperature,
    ROUND(wm.avg_humidity::numeric, 1) AS humidity,
    ROUND(wm.avg_wind_speed::numeric, 2) AS wind
  FROM weather_metrics wm
  WHERE $__timeFilter(wm.window_start)
    AND wm.city = 'Berlin'
    AND wm.window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
  ORDER BY wm.window_start DESC
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  city,
  window_start,
  window_duration,
  temperature,
  humidity,
  wind
FROM latest
UNION ALL
SELECT
  'Berlin' AS city,
  NULL::timestamp AS window_start,
  'No data' AS window_duration,
  NULL::numeric AS temperature,
  NULL::numeric AS humidity,
  NULL::numeric AS wind
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM latest)

panels.title: Berlin

panels.description: Latest marker per city, colored by temperature. Tooltip shows temperature, humidity, wind and window duration.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (wm.city)
    wm.city,
    wm.window_start,
    wm.avg_temperature,
    wm.avg_humidity,
    wm.avg_wind_speed,
    wm.window_duration
  FROM weather_metrics wm
  WHERE $__timeFilter(wm.window_start)
    AND wm.city ~* '${city:regex}'
    AND wm.window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
  ORDER BY wm.city, wm.window_start DESC
)
SELECT
  l.window_start AS "time",
  l.city,
  d.latitude,
  d.longitude,
  ROUND(l.avg_temperature::numeric, 1) AS temperature,
  ROUND(l.avg_humidity::numeric, 1) AS humidity,
  ROUND(l.avg_wind_speed::numeric, 2) AS wind_speed,
  l.window_duration
FROM latest l
JOIN city_dim d ON d.city = l.city
ORDER BY l.city

panels.title: Weather Map

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(window_start, $__interval),
  AVG(avg_temperature) AS value,
  city AS metric
FROM weather_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
  AND city ~* '${city:regex}'
  AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(window_start, $__interval),
  AVG(avg_humidity) AS value,
  city AS metric
FROM weather_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
  AND city ~* '${city:regex}'
  AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

panels.description: Wind speed trend grouped by city

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(window_start, $__interval),
  AVG(avg_wind_speed) AS value,
  city AS metric
FROM weather_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
  AND city ~* '${city:regex}'
  AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
GROUP BY 1, 3
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Wind by City

panels.description: Single city selected = that city latest value. Multiple cities selected = average of latest city values. Legend: blue < 0C, green 0-20C, orange 20-30C, red > 30C.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (city)
    city,
    avg_temperature
  FROM weather_metrics
  WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
    AND city ~* '${city:regex}'
    AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
  ORDER BY city, window_start DESC
)
SELECT ROUND(AVG(avg_temperature)::numeric, 1) AS value
FROM latest

panels.title: Selected Cities - Temperature (Latest Avg)

panels.description: Single city selected = that city latest value. Multiple cities selected = average of latest city values. Legend: green < 60%, orange 60-80%, red > 80%.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (city)
    city,
    avg_humidity
  FROM weather_metrics
  WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
    AND city ~* '${city:regex}'
    AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
  ORDER BY city, window_start DESC
)
SELECT ROUND(AVG(avg_humidity)::numeric, 1) AS value
FROM latest

panels.title: Selected Cities - Humidity (Latest Avg)

panels.description: Single city selected = that city latest value. Multiple cities selected = average of latest city values. Legend: green < 5 m/s, orange 5-10 m/s, red > 10 m/s.

targets.rawSql:
WITH latest AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (city)
    city,
    avg_wind_speed
  FROM weather_metrics
  WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
    AND city ~* '${city:regex}'
    AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
  ORDER BY city, window_start DESC
)
SELECT ROUND(AVG(avg_wind_speed)::numeric, 2) AS value
FROM latest

panels.title: Selected Cities - Wind (Latest Avg)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  window_start,
  window_end,
  city,
  ROUND(avg_temperature::numeric, 1) AS avg_temperature,
  ROUND(avg_humidity::numeric, 1) AS avg_humidity,
  ROUND(avg_wind_speed::numeric, 2) AS avg_wind_speed,
  window_duration
FROM weather_metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(window_start)
  AND city ~* '${city:regex}'
  AND window_duration ~* '${window_duration:regex}'
ORDER BY window_start DESC
LIMIT 50

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT city FROM weather_metrics ORDER BY 1
list.name: city
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT city FROM weather_metrics ORDER BY 1

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT window_duration FROM weather_metrics ORDER BY 1
list.name: window_duration
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT window_duration FROM weather_metrics ORDER BY 1
